metadata.Title: CVE-2017-11343 on Ubuntu 21.04 (hirsute) - low.
metadata.Description: Due to an incomplete fix for CVE-2012-6125, all versions of CHICKEN Scheme up to and including 4.12.0 are vulnerable to an algorithmic complexity attack. An attacker can provide crafted input which, when inserted into the symbol table, will result in O(n) lookup time.

criterions.comment: chicken package in hirsute, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '4.12.0-0.3').
